properties.Description: Toronto-TMC: Completing work for COT Project - 25ECS-RD-102LR. Sidewalks will be closed one at a time, always allowing pedestrians to have access down the road. Paving closures will allow local traffic at all times. Recon & Paving closures will be set up once per activity and drivable lane will be provided outside of work areas during recon. For paving closure will be set up and removed at end of day. Metrolinx Permits attached. Updated TCP attached. Access will be maintained at all times for residents. TCP & Cut permits attached.

Toronto-TMC: Surveying of monitoring points across the OTG Corridor. Intermittent and VSD closures assisted by a PDO/vehicle and signalized work vehicle. Evening work hours, Sunday - Friday nights (9pm-6am), excluding holidays. This permit has expired -- an extended permit has been requested.

Toronto-TMC: Osgoode Station Site Staging. One southbound lane closed along Simcoe St. between Queen St. W. and the Simcoe Laneway. Northbound University Ave. lanes shifted west to accommodate north shaft piling work. RoDARS to extend site staging. Extended permit not yet issued but has been requested.
